name: contest-pass
effect: Allows the trainer to enter Contests.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The pass required for entering Pokémon Contests. It has a drawing of an award ribbon on it.
flavor_text.platinum: The pass required for entering Pokémon Contests. It has a drawing of an award ribbon on it.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The pass required for entering Pokémon Contests. It has a drawing of an award ribbon on it.
